trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of selection requested using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u het type selectie aangevraagd met de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methode.

trans-unit.source: This flag represents either a single or multiple certificate selection using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Deze vlag vertegenwoordigt één of meerdere certificaat selectie met behulp van de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>methode.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2UI.SelectFromCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The user can use the SHIFT or CRTL keys to select more than one X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: De gebruiker kan de toetsen SHIFT of CTRL gebruiken om meer dan een x.509-certificaat te selecteren.

trans-unit.source: The UI allows the user to select one X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: De gebruikersinterface kan de gebruiker om een X.509-certificaat te selecteren.
